title: 2 Darkin Still Remain
body:
There are still two Darkin who walk/trapped on Runterra. 

Aatrox {{champion:266}}  is top lane
Kayn/Rhaast {{champion:141}}  is Jungle
Varus {{champion:110}}  is ADC

All that remains is Support and mid lane. 

My theory is the next one will be one of the two which would make for an awesome team of 5 of full Darkin. 
Hopefully the next one is female so it adds more to the ranks.

If the Darkin is a support, for it to be a lot like Thresh {{champion:412}}  or Leona {{champion:89}}  , someone tank but can also run AP too to deal some damage.
Or if a mid lane, then the Darkin could be another assassin who is agile and deadly.

Anyone have any concepts they want to share so maybe Riot can make it a thing? 

Feel free to add ideas here!

replies.body:
Ayyyy I love this kind of theorycrafting! I really hope we eventually get a full rounded out Darkin team, that'd be pretty sick for squad goals xD! 

Make sure you're posting this kind of stuff over in [**Story, Art, and Sound**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art) as well so others will see it and can chime in!
Its probably going to be morgana as a darkin, shes the most similar in style to the others
What about Kayle?  Maybe her sword thirsts for righteous judgement!  I don't know of course, just fun thinking of the possibilities.  :D

I actually spent a long time this afternoon poring over all the champions trying to find anyone who had a weapon or artifact that could have come from Shurima, and Kayle was one of the ones I looked at!  Since she does make a point (no pun intended) of keeping her face covered, so if there were any physical changes, we wouldn't know, but her sword was apparently forged before time itself (and yet still so shiny =p ) 

But the updated story just points to Cassiopeia and Sivir sooo much!  Varus even walks into a room that is guarded by a serpent-headed god.   I just can't wait for the next Darkin reveal!!!!

I'm thinking this probably doesn't belong in Help & Support, but I was looking over all the stuff today in the Universe.  

Varus went to Shurima.  

Sivir, at the time of her lore rework, was sent there to retrieve a very special weapon - her crossblade.  It was found with an ancient sarcophagus, and said to be as sharp as ever, and she felt insanely drawn to the blade.  If you go back to Kayn's lore, he too was said to have been drawn to his Darkin Blade.  Shortly after she found her crossblade, she was employed by Cassiopeia to go find something.  But it was all a ruse.    

Cassiopeia attempts to kill her to steal the crossblade.  Now, Cassiopeia's old lore is gone, and it's very vague on the Universe site as to how she became her new form.  It says an ancient Shuriman tomb guardian changed her with venom, but I'm wondering if there isn't something a bit more special about that blade.    

And what we can see clearly from the game is that Sivir does get her crossblade back, because she uses it.  But Sivir doesn't appear to have any sort of "contamination" from a Darkin, and her crossblade looks normal by the time she gets it back.  Cassiopeia on the other hand... is definitely not her normal self anymore.  And while we've seen 3 male Darkins, we've never seen a female Darkin before to know what it would look like.  I suppose it's possible that it could still be pretty.  After all, Assassin Kayn is darn pretty.  

I'm still going through everybody's lore right now to see if anyone else has a Shuriman weapon, but my bet is that if you're correct and they are pushing for a Darkin team, it's a mid lane Cassiopeia.
